title: Compiler panic compiling libcore

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: T-bootstrap
labels.description: Relevant to the bootstrap subteam: Rust's build system (x.py and src/bootstrap)

labels.name: A-save-analysis
labels.description: Area: saving results of analyses such as inference and borrowck results to a file.

body:
Last rebase was 11. Aug. Using rust-llvm-2017-07-20.

EDIT: First bad commit is 783ccc443b88884a10eed564e0fdc3c1e6f974a4

Compiling with:
```sh
	cd $(rust_src) && \
	./configure --enable-debug \
              --enable-extended \
	      --prefix=$(rust_dest) \
              --sysconfdir=$(rust_dest)/etc \
              --localstatedir=$(rust_dest)/var/lib \
              --datadir=$(rust_dest)/share \
              --infodir=$(rust_dest)/share/info \
              --default-linker=gcc \
              --llvm-root=$(llvm_dest) \
              --enable-llvm-link-shared
	cd $(rust_src) && make
	cd $(rust_src) && make install
```

```sh
error: internal compiler error: src/librustc/ty/context.rs:237: node unknown node (id=1) with HirId::owner DefId { krate: CrateNum(0), node: DefIndex(0) => core/a38a63e } cannot be placed in TypeckTables with local_id_root DefId { krate: CrateNum(0), node: DefIndex(1533) => core/a38a63e::panicking[0]::panic_fmt[0] }

note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.

note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports

note: rustc 1.21.0-dev (41193c16f 2017-08-18) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
```
